titles.title: Combat Valley Fever Act
A bill to provide for the establishment of a national registry to track cases of coccidioidomycosis, and for other purposes.
Combat Valley Fever Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Combat Valley Fever Act
This bill requires the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to establish a registry and award grants for the purpose of tracking cases of coccidioidomycosis (also known as Valley fever)—a lung infection caused by a certain fungus found in soil.
